reviews.review: How have you NOT played this yet? Honestly, it's a game of the century. A landmark in the industry and a cornerstone of my entire being. It's a classic.

BIG FAN OF GAMES THAT HAVE PORTALS IN PORTAL 1 IN 2 IN PORTAL GAMES
简单但极有深度的“传送门”设定，优秀充满想象力的谜题设计，V社一如既往的优秀剧情，个性鲜明有趣的角色，相比一代有着全方位的进步，精益求精，也许是最优秀的解谜游戏了。

This is my favorite game. When I try to explain the conceptual video game as an art medium this would be my top example to point to in terms of AAA gaming. The way Valve melds story and gameplay elements makes Portal 2 a joy to play, and something to keep coming back to years down the line.

Simply a must play.
Messes with my spacial awareness very good time

- start playing the game
- have fun for a bit
- eventually reach chapter 8
- it gets more challenging
- get stuck on a chamber for half an hour
- check how hard the game is on google to validate yourself getting stuck for so long
- everyone is calling the game a cakewalk
- "The puzzles in Portal 2 weren't challenging in the slightest"
- after a few minutes of research, realise just how stupid you are
- rest of the game becomes more and more soul crushing when success isn't immediately found
- feel like shit for the rest of the experience
- weep at your own incompetence afterwards

good game, just made me feel like genuinely awful.
good game if you dont mind smashing your keyboard trying to find out how to fling your self to the elevator
The first portal game I have played and it was a ton of fun to play. The puzzles and the sassy commentary along with the ability to sabotage your partner made it so enjoyable and addicting!
yes yes, oh yea, and yes. this is the greatest game ever made.

[h1]Нажмите пробел,чтобы сказать "да"[/h1]

Portal 2-один из тех редких случаев,когда продолжение оказывается ещё увлекательнее оригинала.Абсолютный шедевр, сочетающий в себе оригинальный геймплей первой части и гениально закрученный сюжет с большой долей юмора.Никогда не надоест слушать нелепые комментарии дурачка Уитли и тонкие сарказмы [Strike]PotatOS[/strike] GLaDOS.Ну а песенка в финале-это произведение искусства. 9 наэлектризованных картошек из 10.[i][u] Настоятельно [/u][/i]  рекомендуется к прохождению.
P.S. Жаль,что серия умерла на второй части с не до конца ясным открытым финалом...

I said on my review for Portal 1 that it was one of the best games I have ever played, but this improves upon the previous in every single way!

It's funnier, the puzzles are more engaging and by proxy more rewarding.

Неймовірна гра, мабуть, краща гра у жанрі головоломок евер.

Сюжет - незважаючи на свою простоту, досить цікавий. Не менш цікаві герої. Прекрасні локації та стилізація рівнів.  

З нетерпінням чекаю третю частину)

Świetna gra.
Ładna szata graficzna, nie wygląda na grę z 2011, klimatyczne OST, fabuła lepsza od tureckich oper mydlanych, tryb kooperacyjny dla zaręczonych oraz satysfakcjonujący gameplay. Oczywiście, za darmo to uczciwa cena, ale jeśli któraś z gier valve jest warta 30zł to to właśnie ta.
